info.description: API to create, update and manage master fund detail information
info.title: Master fund information

get.summary: Retrieves the list of master fund informations
get.description: Retrieves the list of master fund informations

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

post.summary: Creates a master fund information record
post.description: Creates a master fund information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

put.summary: Updates master fund information records with identifiers specified in the payload
put.description: Updates master fund information records with identifiers specified in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.summary: Deletes master fund information records with identifiers provided in the payload
delete.description: Deletes master fund information records with identifiers provided in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

get.summary: Retrieves a specific master fund information record
get.description: Retrieves a specific master fund information record

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.description: Deletes a master fund information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

reference.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the record

entityType.description: Identifies the entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

internalId.description: Internal identifier of the records.  Generated by the system during POST and can be used for other operations

promoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

promoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

parent.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the parent record, if the current record belongs to sub entities

parentEntityType.description: Identifies the parent entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

parentInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the parent record

parentExternalId.description: External identifier of the parent record

parentPromoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

parentPromoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

masterfund.description: Contains individual attributes of the Master fund entity

entityStatus.description: Fund status code. For example: 1(Active), 2(Inactive), 3(Deleted) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_USE.

domicile.description: The master fund domicile country codeÂ  (2 letter country code: Eg. US). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

nationality.description: Master Fund nationality country codeÂ  (2 letter country code: Eg. US). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

referenceCurrency.description: The master fund reference currency (in 3 letter ISO format eg USD).  Currency in which all accounting records are kept and in which valuations are reported. Once created it may not be changed. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

managementType.description: The management type to define nature of the fund. Allowed values are from the list of type codes in MFGI table GENRE.

accountingChart.description: The reference number of the master fund accounting chart of accounts . For example: 02(IGELUX), 03 (Belgian chart)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PLAN.

valuationMethod.description: Valuation Method code to be applied in the fund-allows  the Dual Pricing functionality to be activated.  For example: B(Bid & Offer), C(No valuation), D(Dirty Valuation)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table AMORTIR.

settlementMethod.description: The master fund settlement methodÂ . For example: 0(Trade date), 2(Value date-Bank accounting)etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table ACCTYPE.

accountingMethod.description: The accounting method used for the fund. Average method should be used for a fund under the EUSD regulations.Â Possible values: 0001 (FIFO by contract number), 0003(Average), 0004(Average with FIFO linkage by trade date), 0005(FIFO by trade date with average book cost calc). The LoV is available in the CMESS table CPT_METHOD.

depositaryBankId.description: The default Depository Bank Internal ID linked to the fund

depositaryBankExternalId.description: The default Depository Bank External ID linked to the fund

valuationModel.description: The default valuation model cdoe. Allowed values are from the list of models defined in MGFI table NESTI.

fxAdjustment.description: It specifies how the cambio positions should be managed.  For example: N(Without FX Adjustment), Y(With FX Adjustment), A (New cambio) etc. Mandatory field but no impact for MFTA. The LoV is available in the CMESS table FX_ADJUST.

reportingLanguage.description: The default language for the reports to be generated. For example: 1(FR), 2(English) ,3(Deutsch) etc.

fiscalYearStartDate.description: Start date of the Fiscal year

fiscalYearEndDate.description: End date of the Fiscal year

exchangeGroupMf.description: The exchange rate group used for the cash flow forecast report at the simulation level,  fund exchange forex and for the swift EOD level. Allowed values are from the list of exhange group code defined in table GRP_CHANGE in MFGI.

exchangeGroupTa.description: The exchange rate group used for client exchange forex, used at the batch process level and used for confirmation by group of funds report. The LoV is available in the CMESS table GRP_CHANGE.

exchangeGroupFx.description: The exchange group used for the cash flow forecast report at the simulation level, fund exchange forex and for the swift EOD level. Allowed values are from the list of exhange group code defined in table GRP_CHANGE in MFGI.

typeOfStatistics.description: The report code for Specific country reports. For example: B(Belgium CBF report), G(German reporting) etc. Allowed value are from the list of report codes in MFGI table TYP_IML.

multiclassCode.description: It specifes if the fund is a multi-class fund or not. For example:0(Not applicable), 1(Daily divident distribution), 2(Periodic dividend distribution) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYP_MCLASS.

initialDate.description: The first date when the fund calculates the NAV.

frequencyCode.description: The frequency code for the NAV calculation. For example: 0001(End of month), 0010(Each day), 0005(Monthly) etc. Allowed values are from the list of codes defined in MFGI.

numberOfDaysToCalculate.description: The number of days to add to the initial date for NAV date calculation. The field is mandatory if the frequency code is 0009 - + number fixed days

typeOfDate.description: Type of date code for NAV calculation. Allowed values: 0(Calendar day), 1(Following working day), 2(Previous working day). The LoV is available in the CMESS table CTR_DATE.

cutOffTime.description: The fund cut-off time(hh:mm) which will apply on all sub-funds linked to the selected MF fund except if exceptions are defined.

holidayCountryCode.description: The country code(in 2 letter for,at eg. LU) for legal holiday application . The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

applicationCountyCode.description: The country code (in 2 letter format eg. LU) of the application country linked to MF fund. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

cutOffWorkingDaysFlag.description: Flag allows to consider 5 days a week while applying cut-off time. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

delayDays.description: Delay days to be taken into account when calculating the revised trade date

allowShortPositionFlag.description: The automated adjustment to cash redemption orders when the NAV dropped and the original order has insufficient units to cover the instruction. For example: 0001 (Block short position processing), 0002(Block short position with exception-Change to All Position), Y(Allow short position), N(Dont allow short position at accounting date) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table SHORT_POS.

exceptionFlag.description: Flag allows to exempt the fund from providing a Fund model to copy (as the accounting schemes are used on chart level).  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N (for No).

savingsDirectiveCode.description: To define if the fund is out of scope, in scope for redemption, dividend or for both for the EUSD. Allowed values: 0000(Not applicable), 0001(Out of scope), 0002(In scope of redemption), 0003(In scope of dividend), 0004(In scope of both dividend and redemption). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_SAVDIR.

transparencyCode.description: It specifies if the fund is transparent or not. Mandatory if the fund is in scope for EUSD. Allowed values: 0001(Not Transparent), 0002 (Transparent).The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TRANSP.

eusdEffectiveDate.description: The date on which the EUSD becomes effective, the date cannot be smaller than the application date. Mandatory if the Accounting Method is 0003(Average).

irishTaxFlag.description: Flag to enable Irish Tax functionality. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

daysFromValuationDate.description: The number of days between the valuation date and the NAV date for NAV reception through interface

typeOfDays.description: Type of day code that will impact the delay days and settlement days while calculating the Trade date and Value date for an order.  Allowed values: 0001,(Business days), 0002 (Calendar days). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYP_DAYS.

usTaxFlag.description: Flag allows to enable US Tax functionality. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

exemptStatusReviewDate.description: It specifies the date when the US Tax exemption was provided if the US Tax is set as N.

usTaxEffectiveDate.description: The date in which the US tax comes into force

swedishTaxFlag.description: It specifies if Swedish tax calculation is applicable for the register. Allowed values: 0001(Swedish tax calculation), 0002(Swedish tax calculation with DTT), 0003(Exempt from swedish tax).

multiManagerFlag.description: Flag allows to enable multi-managers functionalities for the fund. At the time of cash flow forecast report generation the Manager defined in this screen is used to send the report. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

ctvCreditPercentage.description: The percentage of credit limit defined as to Control on Transaction Volume

ctvDebitPercentage.description: The percentage of debit limit defined as to Control on Transaction Volume

ctvNettingPercentage.description: The netting percentage limit defined as to Control on Transaction Volume

ctvCreditAmount.description: The amount of credit limit defined as to Control on Transaction Volume

ctvDebitAmount.description: The amount of debit limit defined as to Control on Transaction Volume

ctvNettingAmount.description: The netting amount limit defined as to Control on Transaction Volume

ctvReportCurrency.description: The currency code (in 3 letter ISO format eg. USD) in which the variation will be displayed apart from the MF fund ccy (default functionality). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

performanceFeeCode.description: The fund performance fee code. For example: 00 (No calculation), 01 (Equalization adjustment-Average Performance )etc.

performancePeriodStartDate.description: Master Fund Performance Fees crystallization period end dateÂ

performancePeriodEndDate.description: Master Fund Performance Fees crystallization period start dateÂ

dayNumber.description: The day number in a week.

simulationCutOffTime.description: It specifies the Time before which the simulation has to be done on a valid simulation date.

manualGracePeriod.description: The delay (positive or negative) time for orders entered manually in the system.

useFixedFundCalendarFlag.description: Flag allows to use fund calendar functionality.  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

useSimulationCalendarFlag.description: Flag allows to consider Simulation calendar definition for trade date and simulation date calcuation. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

monthEndDateType.description: The month end type code to apply for NAV date calculation if the month end falls on a week end or holiday. The field is mandatory if the frequency code is 0017 - Fixed week days + Month end. Allowed values: 0(Calendar day), 1(Following working day), 2(Previous working day).  The LoV is available in the CMESS table CTR_DATE.

lockupMethod.description: To define if the lockup applies to Redemptions, Switches, or both. Allowed values : 01(Redemptions only), 02(Redemptions and Switches). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_LOCKUP.

lockupDuration.description: The number of days in the lockup period, if any

lockupSoftWarningFlag.description: Flag enables soft warning if a debit transaction covered by the lockup method is attempted in the lockup period. Allowed values: Y (to enable), No (to diable).

lockupSinceRegisterInceptionFlag.description: Flag allows checking lock up period based on the trade date of the order or based on each credit contract's trade date for partnership funds.  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

exceptionalPfParameter.description: The number of decimal to be considered for the performance fee calculation and hurdle management. Possible Values: N(No specific PF or decimal places setup), D (Use maximum decimal places only), P (Use PF setup for Fund level calculation). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PF_EXCEPT.

incomeAllocationMethod.description: The general accounting method for partnerships. The field is applicable for partnership funds (Management type = PART). Allowed values are from the list of methods in MFGI table ALLOC_MTHD.

fatcaStatus.description: FATCA status code. For example: 0000(TBD), 0001(PFFI-Participating FFI), 0002 (NPFFI-Non participating FFI) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_STAGEN.

giin.description: GIIN identification number. Each registering FI will be given a FATCA ID that will be used for purposes of establishing and accessing the FI's online FATCA account.

fatcaExemptionReason.description: FATCA exempt reason code of the Fund promoter. Allowed values: 0001(Foreign government), 0002(Foreign retirement plan), 0003(Non financial publicly traded company), 0004 (Exempt US entity), TBD(TBD). The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_EXEMPT.

forecastTaCode.description: The cash flow forecast report specifications at the simulation level. Allowed values: 0001(Reference currency without details), 0002(Quotation  currency without details), 0003 (Reference currency with details), 0004(Quotation  currency with details).  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FORECA.

debitAdjustmentPerLotFlag.description: Flag allows to issue one debit adjustment per linked credit contract, instead of providing only one bulk debit adjustment.  Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

fxAdjustmentOnIncome.description: FX adjustment on income code.  Allowed values: 1(Forex adjustment on interest), 2(Interest starting at first date). The LoV is available in the CMESS table CALINT.

accountingDateTa.description: The accounting date of TA used for calculation of fund accounting date

cashFlowId.description: Cash Flow ID code linked to Master Fund. Allowed values are from the list of  cash flow Ids defined in cash flow definition in MFGI.

seriesPriceFromLeadSharesFlag.description: Flag allows to calculate the series prices from the lead series. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).  If the flag is N, the series share prices needs to be manually recorded.

fatcaModel.description: It specifies the IGA model code. For example: 0000(Non IGA), 0001(IGA Model 1 with reciprocity), 0002(IGA Model 1 without reciprocity), 0003(IGA Model 2). The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_MODEL.

holidayIncludedForTradeDateFlag.description: Flag allows to consider the hoilday for trade date calculation. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).

sponsoringEntityId.description: Central Register Internal ID  having Type as SE, can be specified as Sponsoring Entity External ID.

sponsoringEntityExternalId.description: Central Register External ID  having Type as SE, can be specified as Sponsoring Entity External ID.

aifmdReporting.description: Flag to enable AIFMD reporting for the fund. Allowed values: Y(to enable), N (to disable)

aifmdReportingFrequency.description: The frequency of the AIFMD reporting. Allowed values: 0001(Quaterly), 0002(Half-yearly), 0003(Yearly). The LoV is available in the CMESS table AIFMD_FREQ.

aifmdAuthorizationDate.description: Date of authorization of central register type called â¬SAI â¬ Alternative Investment Fund Managerâ¬�

authorizedAifm.description: The authorized AIFMD - Central Register with Type - â¬SAI â¬ Alternative Investment Fund Managerâ¬�

aifmdText.description: Free text to add any comments if any

collectionAccountGroup.description: Collection Account Group code used to group deals and receipts that can be matched together. The LoV is available in the CMESS table COLACGP.

importNavBy.description: NAV currency used for interface NAV price. Allowed values: 1(Reference currency) ,2(Quotation currency).

navCurencyGroup.description: The exchange rate group to be used for the conversion of NAV prices if not from MFGA. Allowed values are from the list of Nav currency group ids in MFGI table GRP_CHANGE.

priceDate.description: The number of days to be added to Trade date to arrive at the price reception date to calculate the trade date and the value date of the switch transaction. The field has significance if the TD for switch method is 0004- Conditional trade date in the TFC.

priceReceptionTime.description: The Price reception time (hh:mm). If the Price date (T+...) is filled in and the Price reception time (hh:mm) field is left blank, the system will consider that the price reception time is 23:59

glFlowId.description: General Ledger Flow ID code linked to Master Fund.  Allowed values are from the list of  GL flow IDs defined in GL flow definition in MFGI.

paymentProcess.description: The payment process to be followed for the deals. Allowed values: 01(STP), 02(Semi-STP). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_PAYPROC.

timeZoneCutOff.description: Time Zone Cut off (hh:mm) of the fund.

timeZone.description: Time Zone country information.  For example: 0001 (CET Luxembourg) , 0002 (EST Boston), 0003(EST Florida). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TIME_ZONE.

cutOffDelayDaysPerCountryFlag.description: Flag allows to include country holidays for cut-off and delay days calculation. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No). The flag is allowed to set only if the flag Cut-off on working day is set as Y else the system issues a blocking message.

fundTradingDesk.description: The Fund trading desk code.  Mandatory when flag Adv. fund trading desk is ticked at application level. For example: 0001(Inscope of fund tdsk), 0002(), 0003()etc.

fundTradingDeskModel.description: The Fund trading desk model. This is a mandatory field when flag Adv. fund trading desk is ticked at application level. For example: 0001(Estimated model), 0002(), 0003()etc.

dividendFundTradingDesk.description: The dividend fund trading desk code. This is a mandatory field when flag Adv. fund trading desk is ticked at application level.  For example: 0001(Out of scope of dividend), 0002(), 0003()etc.

crsStatus.description: CRS status code. Allowed values: 0000 (TBD), 0001 (Active NFE), 0002 (Passive NFE). The LoV is available in the CMESS table CRS_STAGEN.

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction code (in 2 letter format eg: US). The field is related to FATCA functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table AML_JURIS.

taxLotsFlag.description: It specifies if the tax lot calculated or not. Allowed values: N(No tax lot caluclation) ,Y(Tax Lot calculation).

depreciationDepositFlag.description: Flag allows to calculate performance fees based on the Depreciation deposit method. Allowed values: Y (for Yes), N (for No).

adlType.description: ADL Type code. For example: 0000(No Anti Dilution Levy), 0001(Anti Dilution Levy), 0002 (Swinging Single Price) etc. ADL type is defined per MF fund and will be applicable to all TA funds linked to this MF fund

thresholdType.description: It specifies the method for the purpose of ADL threshold calculation. Allowed values: 0001(Bulked ADL type), 0002(Individual ADL type). For ADL Type - 0002, 0003, 0004, 0005, 0006 only the 0001-Bulked ADL Type can be defined.

thresholdNavPercentage.description: The Threshold NAV percentage based on which the threshold amount will be calculated.

thresholdAmount.description: Threshold amount for ADL and SSP calculation.

thresholdCurrency.description: Threshold currency (in 3 letter ISO format eg: USD). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

softThresholdFlag.description: Flag allows to enable ADL fees calculation on the total amount of Net In/Outflow. The flag can be set only for the ADL Type - 0005(ADL on cash excess incl/excl threshold). Allowed values: Y (for Yes), No (for No).
